org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner

Class POPInternalPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner.POPInternalPlan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class POPInternalPlan
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Internal incremental plan to calculate a refinement over a parent plan.
    Since:
    1.0
